    • Uses of Service in sorcer.core.loki.group

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GroupManagement
      The group management interface lays the interface for database interaction, wrapping dataContext passing to send and retrieve information to the database

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.core.provider

      Classes in sorcer.core.provider that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServiceProvider
      The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
      class  ServiceTasker
      A ServiceTasker is a service coordinating execution of all methods as specified by signatures associated with the instance of service Task and control flow exertion of task type.

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.core.provider.cataloger

      Classes in sorcer.core.provider.cataloger that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServiceCataloger
      The facility for maintaining a cache of all SORCER OS :: providers Service s as specified by provider.template.match=sorcer.service.Service in the sorcer.env configuration file.

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.core.provider.jobber

      Classes in sorcer.core.provider.jobber that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServiceJobber
      ServiceJobber - The SORCER rendezvous service provider that provides coordination for executing exertions using directly (PUSH) service providers.
      class  ServiceSpacer
      ServiceSpacer - The SORCER rendezvous service provider that provides coordination for executing exertions using JavaSpace from which provides PULL exertions to be executed.

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.core.provider.proxy

      Subinterfaces of Service in sorcer.core.provider.proxy 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Outer
      Smart proxies and composite proxies extending their functionalty via calls on the inner proxies implement this interface.
      interface  Partner
      Servers and other compound proxies using inner proxies to extend their functionalty via calls on the inner proxies implement this interface.
      interface  RemotePartner
      Remote servers and other compound remote proxies using inner proxies to extend their functionality via calls on the inner proxies implement this interface.

      The IfExertion implements the Conditional interface.

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.security.sign

      Classes in sorcer.security.sign that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SignedServiceTask
      Any task that needs to be saved in a database is sent by encapsulating it in a SignedServiceTask.

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.service

      Subinterfaces of Service in sorcer.service 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Jobber
      A service coordinating a Job execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all component exertions of the received job.
      interface  Spacer
      SORCER also extends task/job execution abilities through the use of a space rendezvous service implementing the Spacer interface.
      interface  Tasker
      A Tasker is a service coordinating execution of all methods as specified by signatures associated with the instance of service Task and control flow exertion of task type.
      Classes in sorcer.service that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Job
      A job is a composite service-oriented message comprised of Exertion instances with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
      class  ServiceExertion 
      class  Task
      A Task is an elementary service-oriented message Exertion (with its own service Context and a collection of service Signatures.
      Methods in sorcer.service that return types with arguments of type Service 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<Service> Signature.getServiceType()
      Returns a service type name of this signature.
      Methods in sorcer.service with parameters of type Service 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ServiceExertion.setServicer(Service provider) 

    • Uses of Service in sorcer.util

      Methods in sorcer.util that return Service 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Service ProviderLookup.getProvider(String serviceType)
      Returns a SORCER service provider with the specified service type, using a Cataloger if availabe, otherwise using Jini lookup services.
      static Service ProviderLookup.getProvider(String providerName, String serviceType)
      Returns a SORCER service provider with the specified name and service type.
      static Service ProviderLocator.getService(Signature signature)
